attributes.review: I thought this app would be a good way to connect digitally but no. The moment it downloaded fully, my phone caught fire, causing me to drop it into the field I was in and burned ALL of my crops. ALL OF THEM. How am I supposed to feed my family now? Without that food me, my wife, and our fifteen beautiful kids are going to starve. Not to mention the adult goats too. All nineteen of our goats are going to starve without the grains we were growing. Plus, after my phone fire was put out, I realized the app deleted ALL my other apps except for Twitter. Not only that but it changed my lock screen, home screen, AND Twitter account so Iâ€™m only following f*scists! Very sad.
